title: A heart-stopping video shows a small plane crash-landing in Boca Raton and just barely missing a worker on the ground

A heart-stopping video shows a small plane crash-landing in Boca Raton and just barely missing a worker on the ground

Close icon Two crossed lines that form an 'X'. It indicates a way to close an interaction, or dismiss a notification.
description: Surveillance footage from the Boca Raton Airport shows the plane zooming into the fencing as a nearby worker stands near the open trunk of a car.
